verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARG1: that secretary of State Mike Pompeo is returning from North Korea with 3 American detainees , who " seem to be in good health] . "

President Trump announced on Wednesday that [ARG1: secretary of State Mike Pompeo] is [V: returning] [ARG3: from North Korea] [ARGM-ADV: with 3 American detainees , who " seem to be in good health] . "

President Trump announced on Wednesday that secretary of State Mike Pompeo is returning from North Korea with 3 American detainees , [ARG1: who] " seem to [V: be] [ARG2: in good health] . "
